solution_line_template: First find the total number of tomatoes harvested: {num_plants} plants * {tomatoes_per_plant} tomatoes/plant = <<{num_plants}*{tomatoes_per_plant}={total_tomatoes}>>{total_tomatoes} tomatoes

Then divide that number by {dried_divisor} to find how many tomatoes are left undried: {total_tomatoes} tomatoes / {dried_divisor} = <<{total_tomatoes}/{dried_divisor}={undried_tomatoes}>>{undried_tomatoes} tomatoes

Then divide that number by {sauce_divisor} to find how many tomatoes are turned into sauce: {undried_tomatoes} tomatoes / {sauce_divisor} = <<{undried_tomatoes}/{sauce_divisor}={tomatoes_for_sauce}>>{tomatoes_for_sauce} tomatoes

Then subtract that number from the number of undried tomatoes to find the remaining number of tomatoes: {undried_tomatoes} tomatoes - {tomatoes_for_sauce} tomatoes = <<{undried_tomatoes}-{tomatoes_for_sauce}={tomatoes_left}>>{tomatoes_left} tomatoes
